text: this is a blend of a local-dev-beta and ftp question, but looks like those module bits that are downloaded through the hub cli can't be uploaded through ftp. :disappointed:
also anything with hubl in it isn't appreciated to be uploaded via ftp :disappointed:

basically I am still breaking out uploading all imgs and font files via ftp/ gulp and will have to run a parallel watch/upload with the local-dev cli for css/js/markup. curious if anybody has any better ideas
